name: Space Mayonnaise
description:
A brave astronaut has traveled across our galaxy in search of mayonnaise,but has yet to get one from Pluto.

Help them achieve their goal by avoiding enemies and other obstacles to get to buy that sweet, sweet Mayo before returning back to Earth.

 Credits Programming/Coding - Lauri Kivimäki, Niko Ahonen
Graphics - Eerika Rauhamäki, Lukas Fagerström, Milla Iivonen
Sound/Music - Nico Pasanen
